body_html:
As indicated just one comment above, this is a decision after we discussed with NVIDIA.
The answer to why is driver issues in the ones required by 9.1, not many new features we need in cuda 9.1, and a few more minor issues. 1.7 is also building right now with CUDA 9.0

The answer to why is driver issues in the ones required by 9.1, not many new features we need in cuda 9.1, and a few more minor issues. 1.7 is also building right now with CUDA 9.0
body:
As indicated just one comment above, this is a decision after we discussed with NVIDIA.
The answer to why is driver issues in the ones required by 9.1, not many new features we need in cuda 9.1, and a few more minor issues. 1.7 is also building right now with CUDA 9.0
